titles.title: To state the belief of the House of Representatives that the President and the Secretary of the Treasury have the authority to choose the order in which to pay obligations of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/25/2011--Introduced. States that the House of Representatives believes that the President and the Secretary of the Treasury have the authority to choose the order in which to pay obligations of the United States.
